Brands.Justification: Dollar Plus is expected to achieve a sales uplift of an estimated 12% due to its alignment with middle-income families, a demographic that contributes over 40% of total foot traffic in Ibn Battuta Mall. Its 4,301 sqft store size optimally matches Hema's, ensuring minimal reconfiguration costs..

Skechers is forecasted to drive a 15% increase in sales, capitalizing on the growing demand for active lifestyle products. The brand's established reputation among 35% of the mall's foot traffic enhances its fit.

Tommy Hilfiger can achieve a projected 10% revenue boost by targeting affluent shoppers, who make up 25% of the mall's visitors. Its 4,111 sqft space fits well within the existing layout for a premium shopping experience.

Charles & Keith's fashionable footwear and accessory range is expected to grow its market share among women aged 25-45, who constitute 30% of the customer base. Its 4,400 sqft space ensures an optimal showcase of its product lines.

Aldo's affordable luxury offering aligns with the spending capacity of 40% of the mall's visitors. Its anticipated sales growth is 8% annually, driven by its strong appeal among middle-income professionals.

Charles & Keith is expected to deliver a 9% growth in sales by targeting female shoppers, who represent over 50% of CCC's existing customer base. Its 2,851 sqft store size makes it a practical replacement.
Crocs is projected to capture 15% of CCC's customer base while driving a 7% annual increase in sales. Its versatile product line is well-suited for families, who make up 60% of the mall's traffic.
Call It Spring is estimated to boost sales by 5%, catering to budget-conscious young adults and students who account for 20% of the mall's demographic.
Birkenstock is expected to grow in sales by 6%, appealing to health-conscious shoppers. Its focus on quality and comfort aligns with CCC's existing customer profile.

Tommy Hilfiger provides a premium alternative to CCC, capturing affluent shoppers and driving a projected 10% sales increase. Its 5,111 sqft space allows for a comprehensive display of its premium offerings.
